name: GlowFall
description:
In GlowFall the player controls a metamorphical figure that must traverse a series of increasingly difficult and mind-bending challenges. Drawn an elegant simplicity inspired a retro neon vibe, glowfall is a gameplay-focussed experience that is easy to learn and hard to master, and one that will definitely take the player to their limit!!!

Do you dare face this challenge!??

Controls-    A, S, Space and directional keys

Has Joypad controller support
